descriptions.profileUsername: This is the username you use to log in with {{appName}}.
descriptions.profileEmail: Please enter the email address you want to use to log in with {{appName}}.
descriptions.profileDisplayName: Please enter the name you want to be displayed as in {{appName}}.
descriptions.profileLanguage: Please select the language you want to use in {{appName}}.
descriptions.profilePhoneNumber: Please enter the phone number you want to use in {{appName}}. This is optional.
descriptions.profileResetPassword: You can reset your {{appName}} password by having a reset link sent to your email address.
descriptions.systemUsers: Configure the users that have access to the system.
descriptions.permissionsAndRoles: Manage user permissions and roles within the system.
descriptions.locations: Configure the rental locations that are available for use throughout the system.
descriptions.storeHoursAndHolidays: Configure the store hours and holidays that are used by online booking system.
descriptions.runtime: Customize and manage your application runtime configuration with ease.
descriptions.emailTemplates: Configure the email templates that are used by the system.
descriptions.globalDocuments: Configure the global documents available for use throughout the system.
descriptions.resetPasswordConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset this password? An email containing a password reset link will be sent to the address associated with this account. Please confirm this action.
descriptions.remainingUsers: You currently have {{activeUsers}} active users out of the {{maxUsers}} allowed.
descriptions.modifyProfileDetails: Modify the profile details for this user.
descriptions.newProfileDetails: Enter the profile details for this user.
descriptions.accountActive: Mark this checkbox to indicate that the user's account is active
descriptions.accountLock: Check this box to lock the user's account. When the account is locked, the user will not be able to log in or access the system.
descriptions.deleteUserRole: Are you sure you want to delete this custom user role from the system? This action cannot be undone, and may impact user access and permissions associated with this role.
descriptions.newUserRole: Create a new user role in the system
descriptions.editUserRole: Edit the user role for the system
descriptions.newLocation: Create a new location for use in the system.
descriptions.editLocation: Edit the location details for the system.
descriptions.locationCopyConfigurations: You have the option to select a location and effortlessly replicate the current rental rates, miscellaneous charges, and taxes to the desired new location.
descriptions.locationIndicateAvailableForUse: Indicate if the location is active and available for use.
descriptions.locationIndicateAvailableForOnlineReserv: Indicate if the fleet from this location will be available for online bookings.

labels.youReceiveEmailsQuestion: Do you want to receive emails?
